scripts.migrate:prod: NODE_ENV=production node knexenv && env-cmd .env node_modules/.bin/knex migrate:latest
scripts.migrate:dev: NODE_ENV=development node knexenv && env-cmd .env node_modules/.bin/knex migrate:latest
scripts.rollback:prod: NODE_ENV=production node knexenv && env-cmd .env node_modules/.bin/knex migrate:rollback
scripts.rollback:dev: NODE_ENV=development node knexenv && env-cmd .env node_modules/.bin/knex migrate:rollback
scripts.seed:prod: NODE_ENV=production node knexenv && env-cmd .env node_modules/.bin/knex seed:run
scripts.seed:dev: NODE_ENV=development node knexenv && env-cmd .env node_modules/.bin/knex seed:run
